#  7 Best Free ChatGPT AI WordPress Plugin In 2024 | Testerwp

  * Home
  * WordPress
  * 7 Best Free ChatGPT AI WordPress Plugin In 2024

  * __byYash Shakya
  * __0 Comments
  * __Plugin
  * __Views 1756

An exclusive collection of the Best Free AI ChatGPT WordPress Plugin for your
WordPress Website!

ChatBot has a significant impact on the digital world. Because an Al-based
ChatGPT’s messenger-style chatbot can create content so much faster than
humans speed. Also, as a content creator, you may have seen the power of AI
technology. Therefore, an AI ChatGPT can help you scale your content creation
and delivers superior human-like customer support to your clients and
visitors.

So, if you also want an AI ChatGPT for your website, try these Best Free AI
ChatGPT WordPress Plugin.

## List Of Best Free ChatGPT AI WordPress Plugins

**1. AI Engine: ChatGPT Chatbot, Content Generator, GPT 3 & 4, Ultra-
Customizable**  
**2. GPT AI Power: Complete AI Pack**  
**3. AI Content Writing Assistant (Content Writer, ChatGPT, Image Generator)
All in One**  
**4. AI Assistant with ChatGPT by AYS**  
**5. AI ChatBot**  
**6. Tablesome – Data table & Workflow Automation ( Contact Form Entries,
Email Log, OpenAI / ChatGPT )**  
**7. Chatgpt, Open AI and image creation for WordPress and Chrome – Bertha
AI**

**Also, Read:**

Best Free Podcast WordPress Themes

Best Free WordPress Themes for Freelancers

### 1\. AI Engine: ChatGPT Chatbot, Content Generator, GPT 3 & 4, Ultra-
Customizable

AI Engine is a powerful plugin that lets you create a chatbot like ChatGPT,
generate content and organize everything in templates, quickly suggest titles
and excerpts, track your OpenAI usage stats, and much more! It is a house of
AI tools, including translation, correction, SEO, WooCommerce product fields,
etc. With this plugin, you can easily create templates for everything you do
to save time and be more productive. Furthermore, the AI Engine allows you to
set Fullscreen, popup, and window modes for the chatbot and has Speech-to-Text
with Whisper API. It also has an internal API that can be utilized by various
plugins. The possibilities are endless with AI Engine, and you can personalize
the user interface to suit your needs.

Details



### 2\. GPT AI Power: Complete AI Pack

It is another awesome WordPress-based open-source ChatGPT AI plugin that lets
you generate content, images, and forms with customizable options. The GPT AI
Power plugin offers AI training, Chat widgets, WooCommerce integration, and
more. Its core features include Auto Content Writer, Image Generator,
WooCommerce Product Writer, AI Training, and ChatGPT – A fully customizable
chat widget and chatbot with Chat logs and long-term external memory. This
plugin also has an Index builder for Embedding, and you can convert all your
pages, posts, and products to embedding format with one click. The GPT AI
Power plugin is a vast WP plugin that leverages the power of OpenAI’s GPT
language model to develop top-notch content, images, and forms for your site.

Details



### 3\. AI Content Writing Assistant (Content Writer, ChatGPT, Image
Generator) All in One

It is an all-in-one solution for Content Writer, ChatGPT, and Image
Generators. This plugin generates high-quality, unique content and stunning
images with just one click. The AI Content Writing Assistant plugin offers
features like Scheduled Content Generation, Image Generator, Suggesting and
Replace titles for previous posts or pages, Generate page titles, Live writing
system, and more. This plugin has the power of advanced AI technology to
generate high-quality, unique articles and stunning images with just a few
clicks using an advanced image generator with DALL-E and take your site to new
heights of excellence.

Details



### 4\. AI Assistant with ChatGPT by AYS

This ChatGPT Assistant plugin also assists you in generating high-quality
content for your blog and help visitors find the answer to any questions in
seconds. Using its AI chatbot, you will be able to connect with the world and
assist in writing HTML, CSS, or any other programming codes for you right from
your WordPress dashboard. Besides this, you can find AI tools such as content
generation, translation, SEO, and many more in this plugin. The Main features
of AI Assistant with ChatGPT plugin are ChatGPT style chatbot, Live writing,
Automation, Intent Recognition, etc.

Details



### 5\. AI ChatBot

The AI ChatBot plugin offers WPBot, an easy-to-use, Native chatbot that does
not require coding. This chatbot is powered by DialogFlow or OpenAI GPT-3
(ChatGPT), and you can manage the ChatBot from the WordPress Dashboard without
any technical knowledge. WPBot lets you chat with site users, display text
responses you made from the WP backend, show a small set of FAQs, and allows
visitors to mail you for support or leave their phone numbers. It can also
integrate with additional Add-ons like Conversational Form Builder, which lets
you build conversations and forms for creating a completely native, menu-
driven WP ChatBot experience without any DialogFlow and 3rd party
integrations.

Details



### 6\. Tablesome – Data table & Workflow Automation ( Contact Form Entries,
Email Log, OpenAI / ChatGPT )

This splendid plugin lets you save contact form submissions, redirect users
after the form submission, create responsive data tables, import and export
tables, and entries, and automatically export data to Email marketing tools
like Mailchimp, Notion, etc. Besides this, the plugin allows you to create
post tables and Woo product tables, edit tables, export to platforms such as
HubSpot and Slack, and much more. And it has an OpenAI / ChatGPT action that
you can use to create AI-generated content using Form Submission Fields as
prompts and give the induced content to other Actions like sending the content
as an email.

Details



### 7\. Chatgpt, Open AI and image creation for WordPress and Chrome – Bertha
AI

We are ending our list with the Bertha AI plugin. It is an AI-based content
generator that helps you write and produce unique content and images for your
site. And this plugin is built with the latest GPT-3 AI Content generation
technology from Open AI that lets Bertha AI write original content based on
your input. The Bertha Art lets you create images from your imagination, and
the Bertha writes the image or product descriptions. You can also craft
marketing copy to convert your leads into sales. No doubt, it is a fantastic
plugin for businesses, marketing, and other agencies.

Detail

## Conclusion:

There are many ChatGPT WordPress plugin you can encounter on the WP platform
for your WP site. Whether responding to simple queries, providing resources,
running an online store, or acting as customer support, the ChatGPT ChatBot
can help your visitors and subscribers and engage with them on your website
when you are not around. This way, you can save lots of time, get more loyal
customers, streamline your workflow, and build new content faster by creating
a ChatGPT bot using these plugins in minutes.
